description.zh: Muse 是一个为中小型 Discord 服务器设计的自托管音乐机器人。它提供了无缝的音乐播放体验，支持播放列表转换、音量标准化和自定义机器人行为。使用 TypeScript 构建，支持 Docker 和 Node.js 运行环境。
description.en: Muse is a self-hosted Discord music bot designed for small to medium-sized servers. It provides a seamless music experience with features like playlist conversion, volume normalization, and customizable bot behavior. Built with TypeScript, it supports Docker and Node.js environments.

feature.zh:
## 产品优势:

- 高度优化，专为中西部地区自托管场景设计
- 轻量高效，适合中小型服务器使用
- 基于 TypeScript 构建，易于扩展
- 同时支持 Docker 和 Node.js 部署
- 由活跃的开源社区持续维护

## 功能列表:

- 支持 YouTube 直播流
- 可在歌曲或视频中跳转播放位置
- 本地缓存提升性能
- 无投票跳过机制
- 自动转换 Spotify 播放列表/艺术家/专辑/歌曲
- 自定义命令别名（快捷方式）
- 单实例支持多个服务器
- 跨曲目音量标准化
- 使用 TypeScript 编写，扩展性强
- 支持 SponsorBlock 跳过非音乐片段
- 可配置机器人状态和活动信息
- 大规模部署时支持全局命令注册
- 语音活动期间自动降低音量
feature.en:
## Benefits:

- Highly opinionated and optimized for midwestern self-hosted use
- Lightweight and efficient for small to medium server sizes
- Easily extendable thanks to TypeScript architecture
- Supports both Docker and direct Node.js deployment
- Actively maintained by a community of contributors

## Features:

- Supports YouTube livestreams
- Allows seeking within songs or videos
- Local caching for improved performance
- No vote-to-skip system
- Autoconverts Spotify playlists/artists/albums/songs
- Custom command aliases (shortcuts)
- Multi-guild support with one instance
- Volume normalization across tracks
- Written in TypeScript for extensibility
- SponsorBlock integration to skip non-music segments
- Configurable bot status and activity
- Bot-wide command registration for large deployments
- Automatic volume reduction during voice activity
